tools.name: SerperDevTool
tools.description: A tool that can be used to search the internet with a search_query.

tools.name: BrowserlessTool
tools.description: A tool for scraping websites using Browserless. It fetches and cleans the content of a webpage. It requires a input of a URL in a format like https://example.com.

tools.name: DuckDuckGoSearchTool
tools.description: A tool for performing web searches using DuckDuckGo.

tools.name: DuckDuckGoCommunitySearchTool
tools.description: A tool for performing web searches using the DuckDuckGo Community.

tools.name: DuckDuckGoNewsSearchTool
tools.description: A tool for performing news searches using DuckDuckGo.

tools.name: ExaSearchTool
tools.description: A tool for performing searches using the EXA service. It takes a search inpute like: Top AI Companies

tools.name: ExaFindSimilarTool
tools.description: A tool for finding similar content using the EXA service.

tools.name: ExaGetContentsTool
tools.description: A tool for getting contents using the EXA service. It takes a URL as the input.
